high_descs: turn left and cross the room to the end table
pick up the newspaper sitting on the end table
turn left and go to the end table next to the chair
anns.task_desc: pick up the newspaper and turn on the light

high_descs: Look down, turn left and walk straight to the small stand with the news paper on it and look down.
Grab the newspaper on the small stand.
Look up, turn left and walk to the small stand with the lamp on it to your right and look down.
Turn on the lamp on the small stand.
anns.task_desc: Grab the newspaper on the small stand and turn on the lamp on the small stand.

high_descs: walk to face side table on the left
anns.task_desc: turn on lamp on side table with newspaper in hand
